plot: Comedy short starring Peter Sellers. Previously thought lost, but discovered in a skip outside Park Lane Films (1996). The film will be shown to the public for the first time at the Southend Film Festival, on May 1 2014.
title: Dearth of a Salesman
plot_es: Comedy short starring Peter Sellers. Previously thought lost, but discovered in a skip outside Park Lane Films (1996). The film will be shown to the public for the first time at the Southend Film Festival, on May 1 2014.
